title: AnalyticalSession
description: This feature type describes the time and operator of a particular laboratory analytical session. <font color="#4f81bd">AnalyticalSession</font> also has associated links to the type of instrument and analytical method used, processing steps applied to data collected during a session, and instrument parameters unique to that session.

time.title: time
time.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">time</font> is an association between an <font color="#4f81bd">AnalyticalSession</font> and a <font color="#4f81bd">TM_Period</font> describing the time period during which the analysis was performed.

operator.title: operator
operator.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">operator</font> is an association between an <font color="#4f81bd">AnalyticalSession</font> and a <font color="#4f81bd">CIT:CI_Responsability</font> describing the operator or organisation responsible for the analytical session.

parameter-1.name.title: name
parameter-1.name.description:
The attribute name:GenericName shall indicate the meaning of the named value. Its value should be taken from a well-governed source if possible. 

EXAMPLES	When used as the value of an Observation:;parameter, the name might take values like ‘procedureOperator’, ‘detectionLimit’, ‘amplifierGain’, ‘samplingDepth’.

parameter-1.value.title: value
parameter-1.value.description: The attribute value:Any shall provide the value. The type Any should be substituted by a suitable concrete type, such as CI_ResponsibleParty or Measure.

parameter-2.name.title: name
parameter-2.name.description:
The attribute name:GenericName shall indicate the meaning of the named value. Its value should be taken from a well-governed source if possible. 

EXAMPLES	When used as the value of an Observation:;parameter, the name might take values like ‘procedureOperator’, ‘detectionLimit’, ‘amplifierGain’, ‘samplingDepth’.

parameter-2.value.title: value
parameter-2.value.description: The attribute value:Any shall provide the value. The type Any should be substituted by a suitable concrete type, such as CI_ResponsibleParty or Measure.

parameter-3.name.title: name
parameter-3.name.description:
The attribute name:GenericName shall indicate the meaning of the named value. Its value should be taken from a well-governed source if possible. 

EXAMPLES	When used as the value of an Observation:;parameter, the name might take values like ‘procedureOperator’, ‘detectionLimit’, ‘amplifierGain’, ‘samplingDepth’.

parameter-3.value.title: value
parameter-3.value.description: The attribute value:Any shall provide the value. The type Any should be substituted by a suitable concrete type, such as CI_ResponsibleParty or Measure.

instrument.title: instrument
instrument.description: The property instrument is an association between an AnalyticalSession and an AnalyticalInstrument that describes the instrument used in the analytical session.

referenceAnalyses-1.title: referenceAnalyses
referenceAnalyses-1.description: The property referenceAnalysis is an association between an AnalyticalSession and a ReferenceSpecimen that describes a reference specimen (i.e., standards, blanks) used in the analytical session.

referenceAnalyses-2.title: referenceAnalyses
referenceAnalyses-2.description: The property referenceAnalysis is an association between an AnalyticalSession and a ReferenceSpecimen that describes a reference specimen (i.e., standards, blanks) used in the analytical session.

referenceAnalyses-3.title: referenceAnalyses
referenceAnalyses-3.description: The property referenceAnalysis is an association between an AnalyticalSession and a ReferenceSpecimen that describes a reference specimen (i.e., standards, blanks) used in the analytical session.
